response.overview: Into the Dust 2 follows the father and son duo of Larry and Tanner Janesky once again as they take on the world's longest nonstop off-road race. Their goal - to both finish the Baja 1000 race; this time - solo. Only 8 riders have ever accomplished this since the Ironman motorcycle class was established. They take on the entire 854-mile course, each by themselves, no teammates. A quest that would be the greatest challenge of their lives; they must battle fatigue, pain, injury, sleep deprivation, and the elements. The distance, conditions, and terrain are so unforgiving that only half teams make it to the finish line, and even fewer make it solo. Will they make it? Get a front-row seat as father and son dig deep and fight to make history for a second time. Get ready for the challenge of a lifetime.
response.tagline: Into the Dust 2 follows the father and son duo of Larry and Tanner Janesky once again as they take on the world's longest nonstop off-road race.
response.title: Into the Dust 2
